message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $1000000. I believe it's a fair starting point for our negotiation.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1000000. I'm willing to make a reasonable offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still looking to maximize the value of the product. Considering your initial offer was $850000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $875000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's worth to you is $1000000. Let me know if this is something you're willing to consider.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $825000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1000000.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to make another counteroffer. However, I'm still not willing to go below $875000. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to meet you halfway again. I'm counteroffering at $850000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's worth to you is $1000000. Let me know if this is something you're willing to consider.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $825000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1000000. I'm not willing to go above this price.
